con:testCase.name: USETHISTESTCASE
con:testCase.con:description: Supplementary Declaration 'Type Z' exceeds Guarantee Limit balance.

con:request.name: Request1
con:request.con:request: <md:MetaData xmlns="urn:wco:datamodel:WCO:DEC-DMS:2" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:clm63055="urn:un:unece:uncefact:codelist:standard:UNECE:AgencyIdentificationCode:D12B" xmlns:ds="urn:wco:datamodel:WCO:MetaData_DS-DMS:2" xmlns:md="urn:wco:datamodel:WCO:DocumentMetaData-DMS:2" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:wco:datamodel:WCO:DocumentMetaData-DMS:2 ../DocumentMetaData_2_DMS.xsd " > <md:WCODataModelVersionCode>3.6</md:WCODataModelVersionCode> <md:WCOTypeName>DEC</md:WCOTypeName> <md:ResponsibleCountryCode>GB</md:ResponsibleCountryCode> <md:ResponsibleAgencyName>HMRC</md:ResponsibleAgencyName> <md:AgencyAssignedCustomizationCode>ABCD</md:AgencyAssignedCustomizationCode> <md:AgencyAssignedCustomizationVersionCode>v2.1</md:AgencyAssignedCustomizationVersionCode> <Declaration xmlns="urn:wco:datamodel:WCO:DEC-DMS:2" xmlns:clm5ISO42173A="urn:un:unece:uncefact:codelist:standard:ISO:ISO3AlphaCurrencyCode:2012-08-31" xmlns:clm63055="urn:un:unece:uncefact:codelist:standard:UNECE:AgencyIdentificationCode:D12B" xmlns:p1="urn:wco:datamodel:WCO:Declaration_DS:DMS:2" xmlns:udt="urn:un:unece:uncefact:data:standard:UnqualifiedDataType:6" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:wco:datamodel:WCO:DEC-DMS:2 ../WCO_DEC_2_DMS.xsd " > <AcceptanceDateTime> <p1:DateTimeString formatCode="304">20180918010000+01</p1:DateTimeString> </AcceptanceDateTime> <FunctionCode>9</FunctionCode> <!-- Message Function Code: Original to be inserted --> <FunctionalReferenceID>TC260100</FunctionalReferenceID> <!-- DE 2/5 LRN / Traders Own Reference - AN..22 we should suggest a format to make it unique ? --> <IssueDateTime> <p1:DateTimeString formatCode="304">20180918010000+01</p1:DateTimeString> <!-- 12/05/2017 10:30.30 Date/time of authentication by the declarant or declarant's representative --> </IssueDateTime> <TypeCode>IMZ</TypeCode> <!-- DE1/1, DE1/2: Declaration Type --> <GoodsItemQuantity>1</GoodsItemQuantity> <!-- DE 1/9: Not official in EUCDM but requested anyway --> <!-- <InvoiceAmount currencyID="GBP">0</InvoiceAmount> DE4/10 & DE4/11: Total of all invoiced items in the Declaration. Cannot have just the currency; must include a value as this is part of a valid schema. Box 22 Removed as all amounts will have currency as attributes --> <DeclarationOfficeID>GBLBA001</DeclarationOfficeID> <!-- DeclarationOfficeID - Temporarily needed --> <TotalPackageQuantity>55</TotalPackageQuantity> <!-- DE 6/18: Total packages Box 6 --> <!-- <Submitter> <ID>HEADER-EORI-HERE</ID> </Submitter> --> <!-- Process rule - When an Import agent submits this sort of declaration then DMS must take his EORI number from the submitted declaration envelope and populate into the submitter field. --> <AdditionalDocument> <CategoryCode>1</CategoryCode> <!--DE 2/3: Item level Document Category code Box 44 --> <ID>5645786</ID> <!--DE 2/3: Document Reference - Deferment decision no. Suggest DAN Box 44. --> <TypeCode>DAN</TypeCode> <!--DE 2/3: Item level Document Type code Box 44 --> </AdditionalDocument> <!-- DE 2/6: Deferment Account No. - see also DE 8/3 --> <Agent> <Name>Adam Shift</Name> <ID>GB33411501001</ID> <FunctionCode>2</FunctionCode> <Address> <CityName>New York</CityName> <CountryCode>US</CountryCode> <Line>1 Bags Avenue</Line> <PostcodeID>NY1 234</PostcodeID> </Address> </Agent> <AuthorisationHolder> <ID>GB23411501120</ID> <CategoryCode>EIR</CategoryCode> </AuthorisationHolder> <AuthorisationHolder> <ID>GB23411501120</ID> <CategoryCode>AEOC</CategoryCode> </AuthorisationHolder> <AuthorisationHolder> <ID>GB23411501120</ID> <CategoryCode>DPO</CategoryCode> </AuthorisationHolder> <AuthorisationHolder> <ID>GB23411501120</ID> <CategoryCode>CWP</CategoryCode> </AuthorisationHolder> <AuthorisationHolder> <ID>GB23411501120</ID> <CategoryCode>CGU</CategoryCode> </AuthorisationHolder> <!-- DE 3/39: Holder of the authorisation Id - should be the same id as DE 3/16 (Importer) --> <BorderTransportMeans> <RegistrationNationalityCode>US</RegistrationNationalityCode> <!-- DE 7/15: Nationality of active means of transport crossing the border Box 21(2) --> <ModeCode>1</ModeCode> <!-- DE 7/4: Mode of Transport at the Border - 1 = Maritime Box 25 --> </BorderTransportMeans> <Declarant> <ID>GB33411501001</ID> <!-- DE 3/18: Declarant unique Id (EORI) - same as Importer Id (3/16) Box 14 --> </Declarant> <Exporter> <Name>Eoin Mccullough</Name> <Address> <CityName>Chicago</CityName> <CountryCode>US</CountryCode> <Line>10 Irwin Street</Line> <PostcodeID>H81 4RG</PostcodeID> </Address> </Exporter> <GoodsShipment> <TransactionNatureCode>1</TransactionNatureCode> <!-- DE 8/5: Nature of transaction Box 24 --> <!-- DE 3/37: Additional Supply Chain Actor - leave blank. --> <!-- DE 3/27:Buyer Id not needed at this level for this situation. --> <Consignment> <ContainerCode>1</ContainerCode> <!-- DE 7/2 Values 0 or 1 (if transported in a container) Box 19/31 --> <ArrivalTransportMeans> <ID>12345</ID> <!-- DE 7/9: Identity of means of transport on arrival number Box 18(1) --> <IdentificationTypeCode>10</IdentificationTypeCode> <!-- DE 7/9: Identification of means of transport on arrival 10=IMO ship identification number Box 18(1) --> <ModeCode>3</ModeCode> <!-- DE 7/5: Inland mode of transport - 3 = Road Box 26 --> </ArrivalTransportMeans> <GoodsLocation> <ID>CW5645786</ID> <TypeCode>B</TypeCode> <!-- DE 5/23: Type of location B= Authorised place number Box 44 --> <Address> <TypeCode>Y</TypeCode> <!-- DE 5/23: Type of location Qualifier Y= Authorisation Box 44 --> <CountryCode>GB</CountryCode> </Address> </GoodsLocation> <!-- DE 5/23: Location of Goods (Not needed for a Supp Dec warehouse removal?) Box 30 --> <TransportEquipment> <SequenceNumeric>1</SequenceNumeric> <ID>DM1234</ID> </TransportEquipment> <!-- DE 7/10: Container identification number Box 31 --> </Consignment> <!-- DE 4/8: HMRC do not put this data at header level --> <!-- DE 3/40: Additional Fiscal References - not needed for Requested Procedure 40 --> <ExportCountry> <ID>US</ID> <!-- DE 5/14: Dispatch Country Box 15a --> </ExportCountry> <GovernmentAgencyGoodsItem> <SequenceNumeric>1</SequenceNumeric> <!-- DE 1/6: Each item must have a different sequential number Box 32 --> <!-- DE 8/6: Statistical Value Box 46 --> <AdditionalDocument> <CategoryCode>C</CategoryCode> <ID>GBEIRGB23411501120</ID> <Name>Commercial Policy</Name> <TypeCode>514</TypeCode> </AdditionalDocument> <AdditionalDocument> <CategoryCode>C</CategoryCode> <!-- DE 2/3: Item level Document Category code Box 44 --> <ID>GBAEOCGB23411501120</ID> <!-- DE 2/3: Document Reference - AEO Decision number; if no codes currently in place suggest EORI Box 44. --> <TypeCode>501</TypeCode> <!-- DE 2/3: Item level Document Type code Box 44 --> </AdditionalDocument> <AdditionalDocument> <CategoryCode>C</CategoryCode> <!-- DE 2/3: Item level Document Category code Box 44 --> <ID>GBDPO1DAN5645786</ID> <!-- DE 2/3: Document Reference - Deferment decision no. Suggest DAN Box 44. --> <TypeCode>506</TypeCode> <!-- DE 2/3: Item level Document Type code Box 44 --> </AdditionalDocument> <AdditionalDocument> <CategoryCode>C</CategoryCode> <!-- DE 2/3: Item level Document Category code Box 44 --> <ID>GBCWPU5645786GB</ID> <!-- DE 2/3: Document Reference - CW authorisation number; if no coding devised, suggest CW ID (ex box.47 codes Box 44. --> <TypeCode>517</TypeCode> <!-- DE 2/3: Item level Document Type code Box 44 --> </AdditionalDocument> <AdditionalDocument> <CategoryCode>5</CategoryCode> <!-- DE 2/3: Item level Document Category code Box 44 --> <ID>Guaranteenotrequired-CCC</ID> <!-- DE 2/3: Document Reference - CW authorisation number; if no coding devised, suggest CW ID (ex box.47 codes Box 44. --> <TypeCode>05N</TypeCode> <!-- DE 2/3: Item level Document Type code Box 44 --> </AdditionalDocument> <AdditionalDocument> <CategoryCode>N</CategoryCode> <!-- DE 2/3: Item level Document Category code Box 44 --> <ID>12345/18.09.2018</ID> <!-- DE 2/3: Document Reference - Invoice exists as a supporting document indicating the transaction value (Code: invoice no/invoice date) Box 44. --> <!-- <Name>Commercial Policy</Name> --> <TypeCode>935</TypeCode> <!-- DE 2/3: Item level Document Type code Box 44 --> <LPCOExemptionCode>AC</LPCOExemptionCode> <!-- New item to take the old Document Status (ITEM-DOC-STATUS). In this case AE = Anti-Dumping Duty Box 44. --> </AdditionalDocument> <AdditionalDocument> <CategoryCode>Y</CategoryCode> <!-- DE 2/3: Item level Document Category code Box 44 --> <ID>GBAEOC03000/15</ID> <!-- DE 2/3: Document Reference - AEO Importer Cert No. Box 44. --> <TypeCode>023</TypeCode> <!-- DE 2/3: Item level Document Type code Box 44 --> </AdditionalDocument> <AdditionalDocument> <CategoryCode>Y</CategoryCode> <!-- DE 2/3: Item level Document Category code Box 44 --> <ID>GBAEOC03000/15</ID> <!-- DE 2/3: Document Reference - AEO Declarant Cert No. Box 44. --> <TypeCode>024</TypeCode> <!-- DE 2/3: Item level Document Type code Box 44 --> </AdditionalDocument> <AdditionalDocument> <CategoryCode>Y</CategoryCode> <!-- DE 2/3: Item level Document Category code Box 44 --> <ID>GBAEOC03000/15</ID> <!-- DE 2/3: Document Reference - WHSE Keeper AEO Cert. No. Box 44. --> <TypeCode>027</TypeCode> <!-- DE 2/3: Item level Document Type code Box 44 --> </AdditionalDocument> <AdditionalDocument> <CategoryCode>9</CategoryCode> <ID>GBAEOCGB23411501120</ID> <TypeCode>120</TypeCode> <LPCOExemptionCode>XB</LPCOExemptionCode> </AdditionalDocument> <AdditionalDocument> <CategoryCode>Y</CategoryCode> <!-- DE 2/3: Item level Document Category code Box 44 --> <ID>GBAEOC03000/15</ID> <!-- DE 2/3: Document Reference - WHSE Keeper AEO Cert. No. Box 44. --> <TypeCode>929</TypeCode> <!-- DE 2/3: Item level Document Type code Box 44 --> <LPCOExemptionCode>XX</LPCOExemptionCode> </AdditionalDocument> <AdditionalDocument> <CategoryCode>C</CategoryCode> <!-- DE 2/3: Item level Document Category code Box 44 --> <ID>GBAEOC03000/15</ID> <!-- DE 2/3: Document Reference - WHSE Keeper AEO Cert. No. Box 44. --> <TypeCode>644</TypeCode> <!-- DE 2/3: Item level Document Type code Box 44 --> <LPCOExemptionCode>XX</LPCOExemptionCode> </AdditionalDocument> <!-- DE 2/2: Additional Information Statement Code 00500 = Relationship between Importer and Declarant / According to EUCDM v2 not allowed at Header Level! --> <Commodity> <Description>Cocoa Butter-SDK123457</Description> <!-- DE 6/8: Description of goods Box 31 --> <Classification> <ID>18040000</ID> <!-- DE 6/14 & DE 6/15: TARIC commodity code Box 33 --> <IdentificationTypeCode>TSP</IdentificationTypeCode> <!-- Used by DMS to identify the type of Classification Id - standard Comm Code will be TSP However SRZ until Drop 2 --> </Classification> <Classification> <ID>00</ID> <IdentificationTypeCode>TRC</IdentificationTypeCode> </Classification> <Classification> <ID>VATZ</ID> <!-- DE 6/14 & DE 6/15: TARIC commodity code Box 33 --> <IdentificationTypeCode>GN</IdentificationTypeCode> </Classification> <Classification> <ID>2500</ID> <IdentificationTypeCode>TRA</IdentificationTypeCode> </Classification> <DutyTaxFee> <DutyRegimeCode>100</DutyRegimeCode> <!-- DE 4/17: Preference 100 = Tariff arrangement erga omnes, no preference claimed Box 36 --> <!-- DE 8/1: Quota order number Box 39. Should be blank in this situation --> <!-- DE 4/3: Calculation of taxes - tax line 1 --> <Payment> <MethodCode>E</MethodCode> <!-- DE 4/8: Method of Payment code CHIEF value is F for Deferred payment but UCC is E --> </Payment> </DutyTaxFee> <GoodsMeasure> <GrossMassMeasure>15</GrossMassMeasure> <!-- DE 6/5: Gross Mass. unitCode specifies the default Kilgrams as specified by UCC Box 35 --> <NetNetWeightMeasure>10</NetNetWeightMeasure> <!-- DE 6/1: Item Net Mass. unitCode specifies the default Kilograms as specified by UCC Box 38 --> <TariffQuantity>10</TariffQuantity> <!-- ~ <TariffQuantity> DE 6/2: Item supplementary units Box 41. Cannot be 'blank' or empty. Must be removed from the dec entirely to validate. --> </GoodsMeasure> <InvoiceLine> <ItemChargeAmount currencyID="GBP">1000</ItemChargeAmount> <!-- DE 4/14: Item Price/Amount Box 42 --> </InvoiceLine> </Commodity> <!-- DE 3/2: Consignor at item level: unnecessary in this instance Box 2 --> <!-- DE 3/40: Additional Fiscal References at item level. Not needed for Requested Procedure 40. --> <CustomsValuation> <MethodCode>1</MethodCode> <!-- DE 4/16: Valuation Method 1=Transaction value of the imported goods --> </CustomsValuation> <Destination> <CountryCode>GB</CountryCode> </Destination> <!-- DE 5/8 Country of destination code --> <GovernmentProcedure> <!-- DE 1/10 CPC / Requested Procedure/Previous Procedure Box 37(1): Release into free circulation from a warehouse --> <CurrentCode>40</CurrentCode> <PreviousCode>71</PreviousCode> </GovernmentProcedure> <GovernmentProcedure> <!-- DE 1/11 Additional Procedure Box 37(2): No additional proc code required. --> <CurrentCode>000</CurrentCode> </GovernmentProcedure> <Origin> <CountryCode>AE</CountryCode> <TypeCode>1</TypeCode> <!-- TypeCode specifies whether the Country of Origin is preferential or not 1 = Non-preferential --> </Origin> <!-- DE 5/15 + 5/16: Country of origin code Box 34b --> <Packaging> <SequenceNumeric>1</SequenceNumeric> <!-- This is a mandatory element --> <MarksNumbersID>TESTTEST</MarksNumbersID> <!-- DE 6/11: Shipping Marks Box 31 --> <!-- DE 6/10: Package count Box 31 --> <QuantityQuantity>55</QuantityQuantity> <TypeCode>PK</TypeCode> <!-- DE 6/9: Kind of package PK = Package Box 31 --> </Packaging> <PreviousDocument> <CategoryCode>Y</CategoryCode> <!-- Only Temporary --> <ID>201809187GB025115132109-12345</ID> <!-- DE 2/1: Doc Reference - date of entry in the declarants records YYYYMMDD Box 40 --> <TypeCode>CLE</TypeCode> <!-- DE 2/1: Doc Type CLE = Reference/date of entry of the goods in the records Box 40 --> <LineNumeric>1</LineNumeric> <!-- DE 2/1: Goods Item Identifier. The number of the item on that previous declaration. If the tag is added then it needs to have a value i.e. cannot be empty or null - have inputted zero to ensure schema validity but it needs to have a proper value for test. --> </PreviousDocument> <!-- DE 2/1: Previous Doc at Item Level --> <!-- DE 3/24 - 3/25: Only needed where different from Exporter details --> <!-- <UCR> ~ Unique Consignment Ref Id at item level - Could be used to store DUCR? This Gap needs resolution. ~ AN..35 DE 2/4: Equivalent to TDR-OWN-REF-ENT in EDIFACT Box 7 - would allow traders to refer to items using their own code </UCR> --> <ValuationAdjustment> <AdditionCode>0000</AdditionCode> <!-- DE 4/13: Valuation indicators; equates to the statement that they comply with all conditions to use method 1 for valuation Box 45 --> </ValuationAdjustment> </GovernmentAgencyGoodsItem> <Importer> <ID>GB23411501120</ID> <!-- DE 3/16: The same Consignee must not be entered at both header and item level Box 8 --> </Importer> <!-- DE 3/24 - 3/25: Not needed where the Seller has the same details as the Exporter --> <TradeTerms> <ConditionCode>CIF</ConditionCode> <!-- DE 4/1: Delivery terms - INCOTERM Code - CIF = Cost, Insurance & Freight Box 20 --> <LocationID>GBTIL</LocationID> <!-- DE 4/1: Delivery terms - LOCODE in this case Tilbury --> </TradeTerms> <!-- DE 4/1: Delivery terms Box 20 - Not sure that LocationName should be used like this (appears to be against the EUCDM instructions) --> <UCR> <!-- Unique Consignment Ref Id at header level - Could be used for DUCR? --> <TraderAssignedReferenceID>7GB025115132109-12345</TraderAssignedReferenceID> <!-- ~ DE 2/4: Equivalent to TDR-OWN-REF-ENT in EDIFACT Box 7 - would allow traders to refer to items using their own code --> </UCR> <Warehouse> <!-- DE 2/7: Premise Id / Id of warehouse Box 49 --> <ID>1234567GB</ID> <!-- Warehouse Type is a separate data item so shouldn't be included in the Id --> <TypeCode>U</TypeCode> <!-- U = Private Warehouse --> </Warehouse> </GoodsShipment> <ObligationGuarantee> <ID>Guaranteenotrequired</ID> <!-- DE 8/3: Guarantee - used in this case for Deferment Account number(s) Box 48 --> <SecurityDetailsCode>0</SecurityDetailsCode> <!-- DE 8/2: Gurantee Type - will need to know what DMS will regard as Deferment --> </ObligationGuarantee> <SupervisingOffice> <ID>GBLBA001</ID> </SupervisingOffice> <!-- DE 5/27: Supervising Customs office - Country code followed by supervising office code {UN LOCODE (LBA = Leeds) then alphanumeric subdivision suggest: '001'} Box 44 --> </Declaration> </md:MetaData>
